content:
CompSci 143A: Principles of Operating System

Instructor: Ardalan Amiri Sani
  • Home
  • Lectures
  • Homework
  • Discussions
  • Reading
  • Project
This course will cover basic topics in operating systems.

Grading

  • Written homework: 20%
  • Project: 10%
  • Midterm: 30%
  • Final: 40%

Textbook

  • Main textbook: Operating System Concepts, A. Silberschatz, P.B. Galvin and G. Gagne, Ninth Edition (any edition of this book beyond the Fifth edition will suffice).
  • Other recommended book: Operating Systems: Principles and Practice, T. Anderson and M. Dahlin, Second edition.
  • Other recommended book: Modern Operating Systems, A.S. Tanenbaum, third edition.
  • Other recommended book: Principles of Operating Systems, L.F. Bic and A.C. Shaw, 2003.

Office hours

  • Instructor: 5 pm - 6 pm on Wednesdays in DBH 3206
  • TA: 9:50 am - 10:50 am on Fridays in DBH 4211 (backroom) (Note that the TA office hour has been updated recently. It will NOT be on Mondays anymore)

Exams

  • Midterm: Friday 2/15/2019 during the class.
  • Final: Wednesday 3/20/2019, 4 pm - 6 pm.

Announcements

  • 1/29/2019: HW2 is released. Deadline: 2/12/2019, 11:55 PM. Submit on Gradescope.
  • 1/18/2019: Project descrption is released. Deadline for lab0: 2/22/2019 11:55 PM, deadline for lab1: 3/20/2019 11:55 PM. Submit on EEE Dropbox.
  • 1/18/2019: HW1 is released. Deadline: 1/28/2019, 11:55 PM. Submit on Gradescope.
